data.name: Fish and Groove
data.detailed_description:
In Fish and Groove you play as a cat that goes fishing. To catch the fishes he enchants them by playing his banjo. Hit the numerical buttons on the keyboard following the beat to score (and to collect his diner).

ORIGINAL CONCEPT


A fishing game or a rhythm game? Why not both?

RETRO VISUALS


Pixel art animations and environments give the game an unique feel for this genre.

BEAUTIFUL SONGS


Amazing songs composed by Peritune. All inspired by classic Japanese melodies with instruments like the Shamisen.
data.about_the_game:
In Fish and Groove you play as a cat that goes fishing. To catch the fishes he enchants them by playing his banjo. Hit the numerical buttons on the keyboard following the beat to score (and to collect his diner).

BEAUTIFUL SONGS


Amazing songs composed by Peritune. All inspired by classic Japanese melodies with instruments like the Shamisen.
data.short_description: How many fishes your rhythm can catch? Help the fisherman (or in this case, cat) to enchant the fishes as he performs beautiful songs inspired by classic Japanese melodies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
